page.title: 14One Day of my life
page.content: By Simon Goodwin Age 7 On a tuesday I get up from my bed early because Adam jumps on me so I get up and go downstairs and turn the television on and I fall asleep on the chair. When I wake up I make breakfast and get dressed and make a cup of tea for Mum and Dad and then when it is time for school I get my coat on and get in to the car at ten to nine. When I get in the playground I can never stop running because I get the reception after me. When we go in I take my coat off and get the pens and green book and give them to Mrs Thomas. Then we have the register and we talk about what we are writing about. Then someone changes the chart and I listen to what I have to do Then when I have done about one and a half jobs the asssembly bell goes. Then we line up for assembly
